QuestData.Title: Meetup with the Caravan
QuestData.Description: The pyramid inside of the Maker's Terrace in Uldum can be used as some kind of super weapon that will end all life on Azeroth.$B$B<Harrison thinks a moment.>$B$BYou need to continue the research you've begun. Head to the southern end of Kalimdor, to the desert of Tanaris. There's a caravan there that's about to leave for Uldum.$B$BPerhaps you can tag along.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Adarrah at Thistleshrub Valley in Tanaris.
